original_title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Black Fox Festival
overview: Kawaii metal sensation Babymetal performs at the first stop in their Five Fox Festival in Japan tour. This July 18, 2017 performance brought their unique blend of J-pop, dance, and heavy metal to Akasaka Blitz in Minato, Tokyo. Attendance at this special event was limited to male fans only.
tagline: The roar of the Metal Heads echoing in pitch darkness…
title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Black Fox Festival
